M-?? Hard to rate this one.. It's a very mixed up movie. It's every genre thrown into one, but they didn't blend it very well . There's too much going on, and not much going on at the same time (that won't make sense until you watch it lol)  The story is VERY "jerky". It leads you in one direction for a while, and as soon as you get "settled in", suddenly the next scene takes you in a whole different direction. This process is repeated throughout the entire movie.
